data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,338,800 citizens of the the state of Yaroslavl'.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yaroslavl‘, Russia

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Yaroslavl'.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Yaroslavl‘, Russia. Please, stir the 19,593 believers here to pray for awakening.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Yaroslavl', so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Andalal people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Andalal people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Andalal people is yours.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Yaroslavl‘, Russia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: the state of Yaroslavl' has (about) 19,593 people who know Jesus, 751,444 people who know about him culturally, and 567,763 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Yaroslavl‘, Russia has a population of 1,338,800.

We estimate Yaroslavl' has 19,593 people who might know Jesus, 751,444 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 567,763 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Yaroslavl' will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.
